name: Luxembourg Asteroid Mining Adventure
description:
Luxembourg Asteroid Mining Adventure

Do you want to learn about asteroid mining and Luxembourg’s exciting role in it? If yes, then Luxembourg Asteroid Mining Adventure (LAMA) is the right game for you!

Learn about asteroid mining in a fun and exciting way by building your very own rocket, navigating through a dangerous asteroid belt, and extracting billions of Euros worth of precious gold! You will also learn about Luxembourg’s ambitions in space and asteroid mining.
